name: Shield of Logres
flavor: The sight of their nation's sigil is enough to rally the soldiers of Logres.

name: Axion, Herald of Armies
flavor: His horn can be heard for many leagues, a rallying call for all knights of Logres.
ability:
[CONT] You may have up to three creatures at this creature's fort.
[AUTO] [Dragocross](Yellow)When your [Dragoshield] is destroyed, you may move this creature to another fort, and [STAND] it.

name: Elegant Fencer
flavor: Don't be enraptured by the beauty of her swordsmanship, lest you find a sword in your chest.
ability: [AUTO] When this creature's attack destroys a [Dragoshield], draw a card.

name: Earthen Guard Golem
flavor: Golems are anomalies of nature; no one really knows who made them, or how they came into being.
ability:
Ambush[2] (You may pay 2 to play this card from your hand face-down at one of your forts.)
[AUTO] When this fort is attacked, if this card is an ambush, you may summon this creature.

name: Logres Swiftblade
flavor: Swift as the wind.
ability: [CONT] This creature cannot be blocked by creatures with 1 or less ATK.

name: Sunscale Ascetic
flavor: She leads a simple, pious life in order to calm the raging blood of the dragon that runs in her veins.
ability: [AUTO] When this creature is summoned, you may choose a cost 5 or greater creature, and [REST] it.

name: Shield of Logres
flavor: The sight of their nation's sigil is enough to rally the soldiers of Logres.

name: Remus, Hunter Adept
flavor: Nobody questions his choice of weapon once they watch him use it.
ability:
[AUTO] When this creature is blocked, draw a card.
[AUTO] [Dragocross](Yellow)When this creature deals damage to a fort, if you have three or less barriers, choose one of your forts, and put the top card of your deck on that fort as a barrier.

name: Guardian of the Forest
flavor: An experienced and decorated warrior, he stands firm against any who would trespass into the sacred lands he protects.
ability:
[AUTO] When damage is dealt to your fort, [STAND] this creature. This ability can only activate once per turn.
[AUTO] [Dragocross](Yellow)When this creature blocks, draw a card.

name: Kingslayer Bee
flavor: It viciously attacks any who approaches its nest.
ability:
Ambush[?] (You may pay ? to play this card from your hand face-down at one of your forts.)
[AUTO] When this fort is attacked, if this card is an ambush, you may summon this creature, choose an opposing creature, and [REST] it.

name: Primeape Javelineer
flavor: Once he has marked a target, it is not long before they find a spear sticking out of their chest.

name: Tanglewood Menace
flavor: It slices its way through the undergrowth in search of prey.

name: Runemark of Tir na Nog
flavor: The runemark of Tir na Nog is a symbol of peace and goodwill throughout the land.

name: Ambushing Tidechaser
flavor: "Surf's up, landlubber!"
ability: [AUTO] When this creature attacks, all ambushes have no effect for this battle.

name: The Keeper
flavor: She takes care of more than just the house.
ability: [AUTO] When this creature blocks, choose an opposing creature with X or less ATK, and [REST] it, where X is this creature's EDR.

name: The Ripper
flavor: Homunculi are created without personalities, but some do develop rather disturbing tendencies.

name: Frontier Explorer
flavor: Sensing a disturbance, she pauses and waits?

name: Hidden Arts, Water's Edge Shuriken
flavor: Researchers have been able to replicate ancient combat methods used by warriors of old.
ability: All of your creatures get Assassin <All Creatures>Â  for this turn. (Those creatures may attack opposing creatures in [REST]. That attack cannot be blocked by [Dragoshield] or creatures.)

name: E.M.P
flavor: A simple but effective counter.
ability:
Ambush[2] (You may pay 2 to play this card from your hand face-down at one of your forts.)
[AUTO] When this fort is attacked, if this card is an ambush, you may choose a fort, and [REST] all creatures at that fort. (Put this card into your discard pile afterwards.)

name: Dismantle
flavor: "Oh, this is definitely still usable!"
ability:
Choose a creature, [REST] it, and draw a card.
[Fort Burst] Put this card into the discard pile, and draw two cards. (Fort Burst: When this card is a barrier, and would be put to your hand due to damage, you may play this ability instead.)

name: Hidden Arts, Reverse Thunderstrike
flavor: Predict your enemies movements, and counter-attack when they least expect it.
ability:
Ambush[2] (You may pay 2 to play this card from your hand face-down at one of your forts.)
[AUTO] When this fort is attacked, if this card is an ambush, you may [STAND] all of the creatures at this fort, and draw a card. (Put this card into your discard pile afterwards.)

name: Insignia of Olous
flavor: The uniting symbol for the nations of Olous.
